description:
HangFire helps to perform background jobs inside your ASP.NET application in a simple, efficient and transparent way. It allows you to define, create and process these jobs asynchronously. With this library, you can move your long running tasks out of the request processing pipeline without losing control over them.
      This package pulls in the core components, SQL Server job storage and other classes required to use HangFire in an ASP.NET application.
      https://github.com/odinserj/HangFire
releaseNotes:
https://github.com/odinserj/HangFire/releases

Dear 0.7-alpha users! Please, DROP ALL HangFire tables before using this release!

0.7-beta2
* Using Common.Logging for logging and Json.NET for json encoding, they are more stable.
* Integration testing helped to fix some internal mistakes.

0.7-beta1
* Short exception stack traces, they contain only your code.
* Clarified some type names, state subsystem was greatly simplified.
* Started work on restoration of the broken tests.
* Fixed: Apply the Failed state when state filters/handlers cause an exception.

0.7-alpha4
* Changed NuGet package structure. See the Upgrading Guide on GitHub!
* SQL Server job storage implementation.
* Improved job fetching implementation.
* Removed obsolete `Perform` class.
* Fixed: empty MVC 5 project Internal Server Error.
* Fixed: Some history statistic counters do not expire.
* Fixed: Use `StatisticsHistoryFilter` by default.

0.6.2
* Fixed NullReferenceException when trying to create a job using the Old API.
0.6.1
Fixes some NuGet package issues.
0.6
This release contains new client API, based on expressions. Please, see https://github.com/odinserj/HangFire/releases/tag/v0.6 for details.
title: HangFire
